metadata.title: CVE-2024-27758 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In RPyC before 6.0.0, when a server exposes a method that calls theattribute named __array__ for a client-provided netref (e.g.,np.array(client_netref)), a remote attacker can craft a class that resultsin remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rpyc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
